messages.msgSnippet: Hey all being the retard i am, i can t find my set of Haynes catalogs, i have a tsuba that is in catalog 10 page 109, #312, could someone take pity on a
messages.messageBody:
Hey all

being the retard i am, i can't find my set of Haynes' catalogs, i have a
tsuba that is in catalog 10 page 109, #312, could someone take pity on a senile
, but skinny guy and send me a copy

_kholz64873@..._ (mailto:kholz64873@...) or thru _www.nihontoya.com_
(http://www.nihontoya.com)

oh also, have an outstanding signed katana with Kikumon by Mitsuhira with
gold inlay upper torso cutting test, has the name of the samurai who did it and
the Daimyo who ordered it done, with an old letter from John Yumoto and
Tokubetsu/Hozon, it's getting up on the site soon, if interested drop me an
email, i doubt it lasts long


thanks so much

BBK


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
